title: About the new poro themed ward skins (Rito pls)
body:
Alright, so I have to commend the people at Riot for the Poro-themed winter — genius.  The Poro ward skins are also adorable, as one would expect... However the death animation of Gentleman Poro, and Astro Poro are so sad.  {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} Astro Poro suffocates in space, and Gentleman Poro's chair falls on top and crushes the poor little guy, unlike the regular Poro skin where he just bounces it off.

[You can watch the animations here.](http://youtu.be/pW8WMUorw9A)

I think we can agree that these skins need some different animations; it will not only enhance their cuteness, but prevent players from being sad when clearing wards.

replies.body:
The Astro dude isn't suffocating, he's just floating off into space! (May or may not be coming back...) As for the Gentleman, a chair fell on him, but it doesn't mean he's dead. :D 

It was pretty hard for us to come up with a 'death animation' for a ward when it involved poros!

No save the poro's,they are too cute to be mistreated! 

However in all seriousness. I think it would be much cuter if each poro ward skin the poro just left in some way:
- normal rolls away as is 
-astronaut poro jet packs away 
-gentleman poro bows and vanishes like a cute magic trick

On a side note can we get each poro theme to be a ward skin too please? It'd be cool to have a dragonslayer poro and the evil shadow isle poro and the mechanical battle cast poros

The shadow isle death animation could be the poro dissappearing into a mist
Dragonslayer poro would run away from fire
and Battlecastporo would turn into a ball with either rockets or a helicopter carry it away

Please Consider my input as these ideas would be awesome in game :) 
Thank you for reading!
What about ripping the chair of and out comes the feather, as Poro just sneeze away from it.?

Any chance we could see a change in Poro Rider Sej or Snow Day Malz? It's going to break my heart to play against them :(
